chart.name: chart.nbr.product.per.family
chart.title: Number of Product per Accounting Family
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(_product.id) AS _num_prod, _family.name AS _prod_family FROM base_product AS _product RIGHT JOIN base_product_family AS _family ON _family.id = _product.product_family WHERE dtype = 'Product' GROUP BY _prod_family ORDER BY _prod_family

chart.name: chart.nbr.product.per.category
chart.title: Number of Product per Category
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(_product.id) AS _num_prod, _category.name AS _prod_category FROM base_product AS _product JOIN base_product_category AS _category ON _category.id = _product.product_category WHERE dtype = 'Product' GROUP BY _prod_category ORDER BY _prod_category

chart.name: chart.product.type.distribution
chart.title: Product type distribution
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(self.id) AS _num_prod, _item.title AS _type FROM base_product AS self JOIN meta_select AS selection ON selection.name = 'product.product.type.select' JOIN meta_select_item AS _item ON _item.select_id = selection.id AND _item.value = self.product_type_select WHERE dtype = 'Product' GROUP BY _type

chart.name: chart.product.launches.withdrawal.each.month
chart.title: Product launches/withdrawal each month
chart.dataset: SELECT _num_prod, _month, _label FROM ( (SELECT COUNT(self.id) AS _num_prod, TO_CHAR(self.start_date,'yyyy-MM') AS _month, 'Launch' AS _label FROM base_product AS self WHERE self.start_date BETWEEN DATE(:fromDate) AND DATE(:toDate) AND dtype = 'Product' GROUP BY _month) UNION ALL (SELECT COUNT(self.id) AS _num_prod, TO_CHAR(self.end_date,'yyyy-MM') AS _month, 'Withdrawal' AS _label FROM base_product AS self WHERE self.end_date BETWEEN DATE(:fromDate) AND DATE(:toDate) AND dtype = 'Product' GROUP BY _month) ) prod_status ORDER BY _month
